PyMilvus 2.3.0 documentation /API Reference /list_collections()

list_collections()#

pymilvus.list_collections(**kwargs)#

Lists all collection names in the database.

Parameters

timeout (int or None) –

(Optional) Specifies the timeout duration of this operation.

The value defaults to None, indicating that no such limit applies.

Raises

Returns

A list of collection names

Return type

list[str]

default
>>> import pymilvus
>>> pymilvus.connect(ip_addr, port)
>>> pymilvus.list_collections()
["medium_2020_dataset"]
